question.content: What are Jim and Henry doing in Henry's room?
Why does Jim have to leave?
question.choice: Because it is time for Jim to go to the library.
Because it is time for Henry to go to the football game.
Because it is time for Jim to have supper.
Because it is time for Jim to meet a friend.

question.content: What will Jim's mother do at supper time?
question.choice: Ask Henry to stay for supper.
Ask Jim to cook for Henry.
Ask Jim to send Henry home.
